issue.title: [C++] Add 'count all' option to count (hash) aggregate kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current "count" hash aggregate kernel counts either all non-null or all null values, but doesn't count all values regardless of nullity (i.e. SQL "count(\\*)" or Pandas size()).
